title: Oakland Athletics average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is gradually decreasing from 2008 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2013, roughly increasing from 2013 to 2014, and finally roughly constant from 2014 to 2016.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 29.2 was reached at Year 2008
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 21.52 was reported at Year 2011
